NAME: alsa-utils
DESCRIPTION: are utilities for the sound architecture

NAME: bison
DESCRIPTION: parses grammar into LR or GLR

NAME: bluez-utils
DESCRIPTION: are utilities for the bluetooth architecture

NAME: brave-bin
DESCRIPTION: is a chromium web browser that blocks ads and trackers

NAME: chromium
DESCRIPTION: is a web browser built for speed/simplicity/security

NAME: docker
DESCRIPTION: packs/runs/ships any application as a container

NAME: dosfstools
DESCRIPTION: are utilities for the DOS filesystem

NAME: exfat-utils
DESCRIPTION: are utilities for the exFAT filesystem

NAME: gcc
DESCRIPTION: is the GNU C and C++ compiler

NAME: gimp
DESCRIPTION: is a GNU Image Manipulation Program

NAME: gruvbox-material-icon-theme-git
DESCRIPTION: displays icons using the gruvbox color-scheme

NAME: gtk-theme-arc-gruvbox-git
DESCRIPTION: displays GTK+ interfaces using the gruvbox color-scheme

NAME: hplip
DESCRIPTION: provides the drivers for HP printers

NAME: libtool
DESCRIPTION: manages the creation of static/dynamic libraries

NAME: make
DESCRIPTION: automatically builds executable programs and libraries from source code

NAME: man-db
DESCRIPTION: is a tool for reading manual pages

NAME: mesa
DESCRIPTION: is an implementation of OpenGL graphics

NAME: mpv-mpris
DESCRIPTION: allows the media keys to control mpv

NAME: neovim
DESCRIPTION: is a fork of vim with useful features

NAME: newsboat
DESCRIPTION: is an RSS/Atom CLI feed reader

NAME: npm
DESCRIPTION: is the package manager for javascript

NAME: ocrmypdf
DESCRIPTION: adds an OCR text layer to scanned PDFs

NAME: optipng
DESCRIPTION: compresses PNG files without quality loss

NAME: qrencode
DESCRIPTION: encodes data in a QR symbol

NAME: stow
DESCRIPTION: manages software installs in the same tree

NAME: task-spooler
DESCRIPTION: queues up tasks from the shell

NAME: texinfo
DESCRIPTION: is a documentation system for printed output

NAME: ueberzug
DESCRIPTION: allows image viewing on the terminal

NAME: unclutter
DESCRIPTION: hides the mouse cursor when not in use

NAME: which
DESCRIPTION: shows the full path of commands

NAME: xclip
DESCRIPTION: is a CLI for the X11 clipboard

NAME: xf86-video-amdgpu
DESCRIPTION: provides the Xorg drivers for Amd video

NAME: yt-dlp
DESCRIPTION: downloads videos from Youtube and other sites

NAME: ytfzf
DESCRIPTION: finds Youtube videos on the terminal
